overview: Liza Lee, fast-talking press agent for Al Jarvis, persuades Jarvis to stage a Musical Mystery Contest, with a $5000 prize to the person who can first name the most musical numbers and their performers. Lots of musicians perform.
tagline: THE HEP PARADE OF '49...with a rousing line-up of top rhythm stars setting the downbeat for love!
title: Make Believe Ballroom
